thread.title: Watch Little Mix go full “Coyote Ugly” in their new video
thread.title_full: Watch Little Mix go full “Coyote Ugly” in their new video

author: Alim Kheraj
title: Watch Little Mix go full “Coyote Ugly” in their new video
text:
Watch Little Mix go full “Coyote Ugly” in their new video We love a uptempo breakup song, and with the video for their new single “No More Sad Songs,” Little Mix have gone full Coyote Ugly , and we’re LIVING for it.
In case you weren’t aware, British pop group Little Mix might be the sassiest girlband going . The four members — Perrie Edwards, Jesy Nelson, Jade Thirlwall, and Leigh-Anne Pinnock — have been K-I-L-L-I-N-G it with their new material, from the happiest breakup banger ever written “Shoutout To Me Ex” to the fierce and sensual “Touch.” What’s more, we absolutely love that the Perrie, Jesy, Jade and Leigh-Anne are actually all really close friends, with Jesy telling us last year in an interview that they really look after each other. Aww!
Well, Little Mix are BACK with another fierce AF music video for their track “No More Sad Songs,” which features Machine Gun Kelly. 
The song is the third single to be lifted from the band’s fourth album Glory Days , and is another glorious breakup banger that sees the group attempt to forget about love lost by hitting the dance floor.
The video follows the group as they head on a night out to forget their woes. However, they end up in a country style dive bar, which from the looks on their faces wasn’t what they were expecting…
Columbia Records/ www.youtube.com Despite perhaps not being the night spot that they were hoping for, the group throw themselves into the party mood, and even go full-on Coyote Ugly on the appreciative revellers. They even give the bucking bronco their best go…
Columbia Records/ www.youtube.com Watch the video for “No More Sad Songs” below.
Meanwhile, Little Mix — who are currently supporting Ariana Grande on her “Dangerous Woman” tour — recently performed a incredible cover of Rihanna’s sleeper hit “Love On The Brain,” and they are serving vocals for DAYZ.
Listen to the cover below.
Amazing.
Little Mix’s fourth album Glory Days is available now.
